TreeDist: Distances between Phylogenetic Trees

Source: R/TreeDist-package.R
TreeDist-package.Rd

Implements various measures of tree similarity, including Information-based generalized Robinson-Foulds distances (Mutual Phylogenetic Information, Mutual Clustering Information; Smith, in revision); the metric of Nye et al. (2006) <doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/bti720>; the Matching Split Distance (Bogdanowicz & Giaro 2012) <doi:10.1109/TCBB.2011.48>; and the Kendall-Colijn (2016) distance <doi:10.1093/molbev/msw124>.
